text_block_list.name: Commercial Narrator
text_block_list.text:
In the heyday of steam engines, soot and smoke 
billowed from steel-covered cities.

text_block_list.name: Commercial Narrator
text_block_list.text:
The people — enjoying technology's innovations — grew 
complacent, forgetting their grand dreams before long.

text_block_list.name: Commercial Narrator
text_block_list.text:
Greatly influence the story with your Job Skills. 
Or tackle the Hard Mode with no skills but your own!

text_block_list.name: Commercial Narrator
text_block_list.text:
Weave your own dream story in 
the VR RPG "Wings of Iron: Hazy Tales".

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Uoooh! Our commercial's on the official site now! 
Amazing! It looks like a real commercial!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hmmph……… It looks alright I guess.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Heheh, looks like Taishin likes it too. 
Let's watch it again, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Hold…… We don't need to!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Come ooon let's go play already! 
We have early access or whatever, right?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hey everyone! I have a suggestion!! 
Why don't we play it on the Umalator?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I know it's a race simulator, but it plays 
some affiliated online games as well, right?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Come to think of it, Board Chair Akikawa did say that. Nice. 
The Umalator can replicate scents and wind and everything. 
Such immersion should lead to a great experience.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Wooaaaah! Sounds cool! I like that! 
Let's go already! Get in the Umalator, Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
First up, job selection! I'll of course be a Courier like 
in the commercial! Its job skill is "Aircraft Piloting"!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
A tradesman who delivers thoughts and feelings, 
no matter how far and difficult the destination! 
Oooh, the passiooooon!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Taishin, you're gonna be a "Mechanical Engineer"? 
You looked good as one in the commercial!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
During the shoot they praised you for the scene where you're 
tinkering with machines too! It looked like you were really 
used to tightening bolts and stuff, it was so cool!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
That's not why I……! I just chose it because of this setting, 
and machine skills sound useful in the game!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Chef, Mechanical Designer, Booster… Hmmmm…… 
There are so many jobs to choose from I'm getting lost……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I'll go for the "hard mode" with no job! 
Sounds more fun!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hard mode!? Then Turbo will hard mode too!! All done! START!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hey!? Ahh…!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Here we are, in "Wings of Iron: Hazy Tales"……! 
Whoaaaaa……!! I can smell the smoke and machines!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's someone from the city! I wonder if she's traveling, carrying that bag!? Look at her clothes…! Woaaah!? Look at my clothes!! They're from the game!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh my goodness! It's a courier outfit!! 
Woah, you too, Taishin! Uoooooohh～～～～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Calm down… You saw them enough during the commercial. 
Look at the new jobs inste—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… Uh, Hayahide? That outfit……

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…… Ah. I think I missed out on job selection. 
I'm still in uniform…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Weh!? Hayahide's in hard mode too! 
Is that what happens when you don't pick a job?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Auu～…… sorry!! 
Turbo pressed start after picking a job……!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No problem, Turbo. I can handle a little difficulty.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I-is that so…? Ehehe. Turbo's on hard mode too 
so let's do our bestest, Hayahide!!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
There's an "EX Job Change" that allows you to use 
a job skill once! And, well, I'm here, aren't I? 
So don't worry, I'll handle it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Let's see, the end goal is to… "Accomplish your mission"! 
But the details are blank, so maybe we learn later?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I see, information displays like this… I can tell you're familiar 
with games. Things should go smoothly with Teio around.

text_block_list.name: Game NPC
text_block_list.text: Uuugh…………
(Thud!!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wahh!? Someone just……!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, can you hear me?! Are you hurt anywhere?!

text_block_list.name: Game NPC
text_block_list.text: …… I'm… so… h-…… hungry……

text_block_list.name: All 5
text_block_list.text: ……… What?
